title: 🤫 I Should Be Selling This ChatGPT + Publisher Rocket SECRET

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify profitable keywords with high search volume and low competition.
steps: Generate keyword ideas using Publisher Rocket's keyword search
Analyze keywords for estimated Amazon search volume and competitive score
Select keywords showing green/yellow indicators for search volume and competition
caveats: Avoid keywords with red competitive scores or trademarked phrases
source_quotes: 'you want both of these numbers to be showing up in either yellow at the minimum or green'

tactics.name: AI Content Rewriting
tactics.description: Generate content with ChatGPT then rephrase it using Quill Bot to avoid AI detection tools
steps: Generate book outline and content with ChatGPT
Paste text into Quill Bot for paraphrasing
Add personal input and fact-check information
Scan final content with Originality.ai for AI detection
caveats: AI detection tools may flag content if not properly rewritten
source_quotes: Google and Amazon are implementing AI detection algorithms
Use AI as a tool, not a replacement for original content

tactics.name: bsr_review_targeting
tactics.description: identify products with high bestseller rank (BSR) and low review counts for niche opportunities
steps: use publisher rocket to filter products
source_quotes: I Should Be Selling This ChatGPT + Publisher Rocket SECRET

heuristics.name: List-Type Content Optimization
heuristics.condition: If the book format is list-based (e.g., trivia, recipes, travel guides), prioritize content generation with ChatGPT
source_quotes: 'list type books... are very very easy to create'

heuristics.name: AI Detection Mitigation
heuristics.condition: If content scans as AI-generated (high Originality.ai score), then apply rewriting
source_quotes: Originality.ai detected 95% AI content from raw ChatGPT output

heuristics.name: review_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If product has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize
source_quotes: low review counts indicate untapped potential

claims.statement: A trivia book for kids can generate $450/month in royalties from the paperback format
source_quotes: 'it's making around 450 dollars just from the paperback side'

claims.statement: Amazon may de-rank or block AI-generated books
source_quotes: Amazon will most likely de-rank the book that is purely AI generated

claims.statement: products with high BSR and low reviews often have higher conversion potential
source_quotes: BSR indicates visibility, low reviews suggest opportunity

niche_patterns.example: trivia for kids + low design complexity + high search volume
niche_patterns.description: Target niches with simple content requirements and proven demand
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages low production barriers and existing market validation
source_quotes: 'these are super super easy to make'
